title: Porsche waters down EV ambitions, says transition will take 'years'
description: Porsche adjusts its electric vehicle sales target, now linking it to customer demand and industry developments. The carmaker acknowledges the slower-than-expected transition to electric cars, facing disparities in EV uptake across key markets. Porsche emphasizes the importance of a dual strategy for combustion engine and electrified cars.
